about_the_game:
Step into the shadows and embrace your destiny as a lethal assassin in Assassin: The First List. With danger lurking around every corner and the fate of nations hanging in the balance, the stage is set for an epic adventure unlike any other. As you embark on your journey of vengeance and redemption, prepare to be immersed in a world of intrigue, suspense, and adrenaline-pumping action.

In Assassin: The First List, you'll experience the thrill of the hunt like never before. With meticulously designed levels, jaw-dropping visuals, and a gripping storyline that will keep you on the edge of your seat, every moment is a pulse-pounding rush of excitement. Will you choose the path of stealth and silence, slipping through the shadows like a ghost? Or will you embrace the chaos, unleashing your fury upon those who stand in your way?

With a diverse cast of characters, each with their own secrets and motivations, and a dynamic gameplay experience that adapts to your choices, Assassin: The First List offers endless possibilities for exploration and discovery. So sharpen your blades, hone your skills, and prepare to write your name in blood as you embark on the ultimate quest for justice.

Key Features:

Immersive Stealth Gameplay: Slip into the role of a master assassin and execute your missions with precision. Sneak past guards, hide in plain sight, and strike with deadly accuracy to eliminate your targets without leaving a trace.

Dynamic Targets: Take on a diverse roster of targets, each with their own personalities, vulnerabilities, and hidden agendas. From corrupt politicians to ruthless crime lords, your targets will challenge you both mentally and physically.

Adaptive Gameplay: With multiple paths to success and a wide range of tools at your disposal, you'll have the freedom to approach each mission your way. Will you rely on stealth and subterfuge, or unleash chaos with brute force?

Compelling Storyline: Immerse yourself in a gripping narrative filled with twists, betrayals, and moral dilemmas. As you delve deeper into the world of Assassin: The First List, you'll uncover secrets that could change the course of history.

Stunning Visuals: Explore meticulously crafted environments brought to life with stunning graphics and atmospheric lighting. From sprawling urban landscapes to remote wildernesses, every location is a feast for the eyes.

Beta Mode: Please note that Assassin: The First List is currently in beta mode. While we've worked tirelessly to ensure a polished and engaging experience, there may be occasional bugs or glitches. Rest assured, our team is committed to addressing any issues and improving the game with each update.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or inappropriate for viewing at work. This game contains Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, Drug Use, and illegal substance use. There are no sexual acts, but there are some sexual themes where people appear half-naked. Please be cautious as this game also includes acts of suicide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent with at least 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 or AMD RX6600 with 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

short_description: Dive into the heart-pounding world of Assassin (ATFL), where every shadow holds danger and every move could be your last. As an elite assassin navigating a web of deception and intrigue, you'll face off against powerful adversaries, unravel dark secrets, and ultimately decide the fate of nations.
